Name: Grand Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: The rich flavours of the orange liqueur shine through in what is indeed a "grand" Cosmopolitan .
Nutrition: One serving of Grand Cosmopolitan contains 158 calories
